tool_description: Make someone's day better - Heavy Metal Quotes
name: Metal Music Quotes
title: Metal Music Quotes

api_list.name: Get a quote by id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://metal-music-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/id/55f5a1d3d4bede9ac365b25a"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "metal-music-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://metal-music-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/id/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "metal-music-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
